=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/02/25 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael J. Bassett'], 'Producers': ['Don Carmody', 'Samuel Hadida'], 'Starring': ['Adelaide Clemens', 'Kit Harrington', 'Deborah Kara Unger']} Review Text: Its lacks the cutting edge the original had, lame plot and bad acting inthe main roles. I wouldnt recommend it unless you really like horror movies.. Review Title: Its lacks the cutting edge Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/07/02 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'Español', 'Português'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Pitof'], 'Producers': ['Denise Di Novi', 'Edward McDonnell'], 'Starring': ['Halle Berry', 'Halle Berry', 'Sharon Stone'], 'Studio': ['WARNER HOME VIDEO']} Review Text: The only reason I gave this two star is because it has Halle Berry in it wearing outfits that dont leave much to the imagination.

I've seen more realistic fight scenes in Disney cartoon. The plot could have been somewhat tolerable if they'd stuck to the Comics and not made it some teenage bubble gum movie.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has experienced several enjoyable films and shows, frequently praising their cleverness and entertainment value. Family-friendly movies received high marks for being fun for all ages, while certain comedies were highlighted as the best in their genre, generating significant appreciation. The user particularly valued engaging plots and astute storytelling, indicating a preference for narratives that captivate with unexpected twists. There is a clear appreciation for strong performances by well-known actors, contributing to overall satisfaction with their viewing experiences.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
On the downside, the user expressed disappointment with several films that failed to meet expectations. Common complaints included lackluster plots and subpar acting, particularly when adaptations did not stay true to their source material. Some reviewed movies received ratings of 2 stars or lower due to their perceived mediocrity and poor execution, suggesting frustration with wasted potential. The user also noted slow pacing in certain films, which detracted from overall enjoyment and resulted in less favorable ratings.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
In summary, the user's viewing history showcases a balance of positive and negative experiences. There is a strong inclination toward films that are clever and engaging, with a notable appreciation for family-friendly entertainment and standout performances. However, frustrations with poor plot execution and unsatisfactory adaptations illustrate a critical approach to selections. The combination of highly rated titles and some disappointments reflects a discerning taste, emphasizing a desire for quality storytelling and effective presentation in their viewing choices.

target_interaction.title: Five Stars
target_interaction.text: There used to a reason for having Amazon prime. Now I have to buy it
description: Now in its 39th season, NOVA is the most-watched primetime science series on American television, reaching an average of five million viewers weekly.
target_interaction.subtitle: Season 8
